alert.note: Alert for Beltrami; Clearwater; Lake of the Woods; Marshall; Roseau (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 20 at 5:55PM CDT until June 20 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN MARSHALL...SOUTH CENTRAL ROSEAU...BELTRAMI... SOUTHERN LAKE OF THE WOODS AND NORTHERN CLEARWATER COUNTIES... At 555 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Oaks Corner to Red Lake Nation to Redby, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Oaks Corner, Saum, Carp, Shotley, Otto and Kelliher. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Beltrami; Clearwater; Lake of the Woods; Marshall; Roseau
